description.message: Tag Gears is an extension for Google Chrome that provides an intuitive tabs management

features.message: Some of the features that will come handy:

feature_discarding.message: Tab discarding. Allows Chrome to automatically discard tabs that aren't of great interest to you when it's detected that system memory is running pretty low.

feature_total_tabs.message: Displays the number of tabs you currently have open in all your Chrome windows.

feature_highlighting.message: Highlighting your current and incognito tabs.

feature_prevent_closing.message: Do you want to prevent closing multiple tabs? It's possible by default and configurable!

feature_navigation.message: Quick navigation with Tab and Shift+Tab keys.

feature_confirmation.message: Use Enter key for action confirmation.

feature_shortcuts.message: Press Ctrl+Shift+T or ⌘+⇧+T keys to show or hide the browser action popup.

copyright.message: All rights reserved. © LLC Pobedit Microsystems

issues.message: For Issues or Feature requests, mail to:

attention_closing.message: Are you sure you want to close all tabs?
